entry.title: Eastbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,122Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Evan Buckley never saw it coming.Not the kiss.Not the silence that followed.And certainly not the storm that would change everything, just hours later.Now nothing feels steady.Calls go unanswered.And Eddie, Eddie has gone quiet again, just when Buck needs him most.As the world shifts, Buck finds himself caught in a different kind of wreckage:the aftermath of a moment that meant everything… and a silence that could break them.EASTBOUND is a story of grief, survival, and the kind of love that doesn’t give up easily.Or…Buck and Eddie navigate loss, secrets, and challenges, stepping into their future together.

entry.title: Dovecote
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,958Chapters: 11/18Kudos: 89

Summary: Buck held the little plastic bird close in front of his eyes, twisting it back and forth.“You can say it, Buck,” Eddie encouraged, quietly. “To put it out there in… the universe. And you’ll see her tomorrow, anyway.”“I think…” Buck took a huge breath, breathing deep into his chest, past the hurt, past the hard rock of anxiety that sat at its center, past the tears welling in his eyes; he aimed all of it back out, straight into the heart of the deep, deep universe.“I think I met my daughter tonight.” or;A work of fate or God or man or the universe crosses the paths of Buck and a small, green-eyed girl with a bird in her palm and the future in her snaggle-toothed grin. Two and a half years after the events of Lighthouse, the Diazes become the Diazes.

entry.title: eat you up
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,274Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Eddie pulls the lid off the pot, placing it on the countertop and dipping a small teaspoon in. He tastes a sample of it.It’s good. The best one he’s made. Buck comes up behind him, looking over his shoulder and inhaling the scent of it. “Taste good?”Eddie hums in approval, dipping the spoon again and holding it out for Buck to try. Somehow, Buck takes it as an invitation to eat straight from the spoon while Eddie holds it, rather than to just take the spoon himself to try it. That’s fine. Normal enough. Except—Buck moans. His lashes flutter, eyes closing as his lips wrap around the spoon, pulling back slowly and dragging his tongue to clean it completely.“Fuck, Eddie.” His voice is low, rough—God, is that what Buck sounds like when he’s turned on? “It’s so good. Is this your Abuela’s chilli? The one she always used to send you home with like eight containers of?”Eddie’s brain is short-circuiting. Every coherent sentence he could offer in response disappears in a cloud of smoke in his brain. It feels like the servers of his brain are fried, just replaying the noise Buck made over and over again.ORThe Buddie Feeding/Stuffing/Belly kink fic.

entry.title: Back in the game
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,989Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 7

Summary: Buck thought life was finally ok again, Eddie moved back with Chris and Bobby was back from the dead and everything was going back to how it was.But then the universe threw Eddie’s childhood friend at him, Juan Perez was charming, handsome and funny. With cute nicknames and inside jokes, Buck finds himself spiraling into a jealous mess he swears he isn’t. (He definitely is.)But jealousy has a way of forcing the truth to the surface, and Buck’s about to learn two very important things:1. He’s hopelessly in love with Eddie.2. Everyone else already knew.Add in meddling family, one very amused childhood friend, and a dramatic kitchen confession, and Buck may finally discover that sometimes the universe’s chaos is exactly what he needs.

entry.title: Where The Lavender Grows Wild
entry.summary:
Author: rose_quartz_queen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,452Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 10

Summary: "From his vantage point on the museum steps, Buck can see Eddie for a little longer than Eddie can see him, and he watches as Eddie scans the crowd. Buck’s heart flutters in his chest, feeling like it's going to explode. He can still go home, he thinks, he can still leave. If he turns around right now, Buck can go home before Eddie even knows he was there. He can pack up his locker at work and leave, just like he did in Pennsylvania and South America. "After a not-quite-unexpected kiss, Buck and Eddie finally begin their journey as more than friends. However, as the pair get to know each other in a new way, Buck must finally come to terms with and heal from the past he has worked so hard to bury.A slow-burn fic exploring what it means to fall in love and find happiness after trauma.

entry.title: Just Ask Josh
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,434Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 114

Summary: Chim is reading aloud before Buck can lunge across the counter and stop him, “I’d beg so loud they’d all know exactly what you—” His eyebrows climb to his hairline, “Buck, what the fuck?”Ravi bursts out laughing, nearly doubling over, “Wait, you sexted the group chat?!”“No, no, no—” Buck’s voice traitorously cracks and he can feel the heat in his face, “That’s not—I didn’t—”Hen’s tone sharpens, amusement undercut with curiosity, “You’re seeing someone? Who is she?”Or,Three months of secret hookups with Eddie and Buck manages to blow it all with one wrong text.

entry.summary:
Author: Taylors_roses

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,894Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: “Eddie?” He didn’t want to wait any longer, no matter what the outcome was. He couldn’t just not tell Eddie after so long, especially since they were going to the zoo together tomorrow."Yeah, Buck?" Eddie replied, as he stopped chopping the tomatoes and looked up at Buck with his full attention, his brown eyes looking into Buck’s, making Buck even more nervous to confess."I have feel-" "Did someone say Tacos!?" Chimney ran up the stairs as he yelled and cheerfully ran over to Eddie and Buck.Buck was now extremely flustered.(Or: five times Buck tries to confess to Eddie, but get’s interrupted by someone, and one time Eddie shuts the door in their face.)

entry.title: Who did this to you?
entry.summary:
Author: Sofo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,298Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 401

Summary: Buck navegates life at the 118 the best he can all things considered, like the way Eddie is acting weird and giving him the cold shoulder, again. His relationship with his boyfriend is the least of his worries. Then things get nasty real fast and he's left reeling with the realization of what Tommy is capable of when all his bottons have been pressed.  “Should I remind you who your actual boyfriend is, Evan?”   “Now what’s that supposed to mean?” Buck gestures wildly with his hands, outraged. He goes to stand up and Tommy follows suit, and now both are looking at each other with different levels of ferocity. Buck’s got to say Tommy is winning this one though, he looks one step away from bursting the vein on his neck.   “Don’t play dumb. You’re obsessed with the guy, with playing happy family with him. You even facetime his kid a couple of times a week. It’s fucking creepy.”

entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 5 - Possession
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,511Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 8

Summary: Where Buck and Eddie learn that giving up isn't synonymous with weakness.Eddie finally opens up, and Buck welcomes him cautiously. He’s already been hurt too much, and there’s no way he’s going to let Eddie hurt him again. Their balance is fragile but is heading toward a calmer relationship.Everything starts to shake again when Abby shows up, determined to win Buck back. Eddie is torn between jealousy, anger, and fear. Their relationship gets tense... but neither of them is willing to give up. For the first time, they really try to understand each other.When a hidden box reveals Eddie’s true intentions, a whole new language takes over: one of offered submission, absolute trust, and chosen possession.What if loving each other also meant choosing to fully give yourself?I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: Dead Men Don't Call (911)
entry.summary:
Author: agc1019

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,339Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 46

Summary: When Evan Buckley left home at nineteen, tears stinging his eyes as he left his sister in the rearview mirror, he had no idea what he was doing. He didn’t have a plan - just picked a direction and started driving, determined to keep going until something stopped him. Towns blurred past in a haze, and the months slipped by.He never expected that ‘something’ to crash into his windshield at two in the morning in the middle of nowhere, Virginia - snarling, bleeding, and trying to take a bite out of his arm.or:the purely self-indulgent buddie zombie apocalypse au

entry.title: Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,660Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 10

Summary: If anybody were to ask Kara why she chose to be a firefighter she’d tell you that she loves helping humanity and wants to give back to a community who gave so much to her when they so graciously took her in. If Kal El of Krypton asked Kara the same question she’d would’ve already thrown him into the sun, since it was his dumb idea to get her out into the ‘real world’.While there’s truth to the fact she wants to help, there’s nothing humanity has ever given her that she thinks she should pay them back for. Maybe she would help the Themyscirans for their training, however, she was already sufficient back on Krypton having been part of the army for years. But no, the reason Kara choose to be a firefighter was because it was a high energy job on a planet where she annoyingly couldn’t get drunk off her ass and thus needed something to keep her occupied.TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Surprise Baby
entry.summary:
Author: Delulu_emily

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,758Chapters: 14/50Kudos: 499

Summary: Buck and Eddie are a week away from getting married.But Buck hasn't been feeling good lately. So, he goes to a clinic.Turns out he’s pregnant with Eddie Diaz’s baby.Buck’s nervous to tell Eddie, but Eddie’s over the moon.Oh, and Eddie loves seeing his now husband pregnant with their baby. (Smut ahead)The two men bond stronger with their family/the team. But especially with Bobby, Athena, and Chris. And each other.This is the story of Buddie’s first surprise baby.
